title: is there a way to get solr.beidermorsefilterfactory  to preserve original
description: We are using the solr.beidermorsefilterfactory  and synonymfilterfactory for one of our fieldtypes. The problem is that the BMPM does not preserve the original token. therefore if index has  " chester av" and query has "chester ave"  a match is not found despite having synonym for av/ave. because BMPM does not preserve "av". is there a way to have preserve original OR inject =true for this issue
